content: anoblecowl a noble cowl by emily kausalik this cowl combines two of my pattern favorite elements openwork/lacy cast on 120 stitches join in the round and place marker purl p 2 rounds patterning and a cotton blend yarn begin shield pattern rowan wool cotton is great for showing 1 * k2tog k3 yo k2tog yo k1 yo k2tog yo k3 k2tog repeat from * around off stitch definition without being scratchy 2 and all even rounds k the stitch pattern is comprised of a shield surrounded with openwork providing an 3 * k2tog k3 yo k2tog yo k1 yo k2tog yo k3 k2tog repeat from * around interesting lacy design with a feminine 5 * k2tog k2 yo k2tog yo k3 yo k2tog yo k2 k2tog repeat from * around touch 7 * k2tog k1 yo k2tog yo k5 yo k2tog yo k1 k2tog repeat from * around 9 * k2tog yo k2tog yo k7 yo k2tog yo k2tog repeat from * around finished size 11 * k1 yo k2tog yo k3 k2tog k4 yo k2tog yo k1 repeat from * around 28cm/11 from cast-on to bind-off edges 13 * k1 yo k2tog yo k3 k2tog ssk k3 yo k2tog yo k1 repeat from * around yarn 15 and 17 same as round 13 rowan wool cotton 50% merino wool/ 19 * k2 yo k2tog yo k2 k2tog ssk k2 yo k2tog yo k2 repeat from * around 50% cotton 113m 123yd /50g 2 balls 21 * k3 yo k2tog yo k1 k2tog ssk k1 yo k2tog yo k3 repeat from * around color shown sh900 23 * k4 yo k2tog yo k2tog ssk yo k2tog yo k4 repeat from * around needle s 25 * k2tog k3 yo k2tog yo k2tog yo k2tog yo k3 k2tog repeat from * around 4mm us6 16 circular needle or dpns 27 * ssk k3 yo k2tog yo k1 yo k2tog yo k3 k2tog repeat from * around notions next repeat rounds 1 through 28 stitch marker m tapestry needle then repeat rounds 1 through 14 the end result should be 2 5 passes of the gauge shield pattern 1 that establishes and 1 5 repetitions 22 sts/30 row = 4 /10cm in st st skill level intermediate purl p 2 rounds then bind off loosely weave in ends and block flat note i tend to make cowls large and droopy because i love pinning them the abbreviations stitch pattern is in groups of 15 sts so feel k2tog - knit two stitches together yo - yarn over ssk - slip two stitches as if to free to cast on less if you want a smaller knit then insert left needle through the front loops and knit together circumference cowl for further help with knitting techniques refer to www knittinghelp com please do not sell this pattern or any items made as a result of using this pattern thank you 8002 tsugua
